from sys import stdin

readi = lambda: int(stdin.readline())
readis = lambda: map(int, stdin.readline().split())

T = readi()
for _ in xrange(T):
    n = readi()
    div7, mod7 = divmod(n, 7)
    
    ret = -1
    if mod7 % 4 == 0:
        ret = div7 * 7
    else:
        mod4 = mod7 % 4
        if div7 >= mod4:
            div7 -= mod4
            ret = div7 * 7

    print ret
